TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DownloadStringCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks Le istanze di questa classe vengono passate al .Instances of this class are passed to the . ## Examples Il codice seguente viene illustrato il download di una stringa in modo asincrono.The following code example demonstrates downloading a string asynchronously. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#28](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#28)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#28)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#28)] Il metodo seguente viene chiamato al termine del download.The following method is called when the download completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#29](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#29)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#29](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#29)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#29](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#29)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Result As String
public: property System::String ^ Result { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Ottiene i dati scaricati da un metodo .

span.span: Gets the data that is downloaded by a method.

value.span: Oggetto che contiene i dati scaricati.

span.span: A that contains the downloaded data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks È consigliabile controllare la e proprietà prima di usare i dati restituiti da questa proprietà.You should check the and properties before using the data that is returned by this property. Se il valore della proprietà è un oggetto o il valore della proprietà viene `true`, l'operazione asincrona non è stata completata correttamente e il valore della proprietà non sarà valido.If the property's value is an object or the property's value is `true`, the asynchronous operation did not complete correctly and the property's value will not be valid. ## Examples Esempio di codice seguente visualizza il valore di questa proprietà.The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#29](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#29)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#29](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#29)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#29](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#29)]
